document_data.name: Temple of Endless Waves and Wind
document_data.mainbody: The '''Temple of Endless Waves and Wind''' was a temple dedicated to [[Valkur]], the Captain of the Waves.
document_data.Location: The Temple was contructed on the back of a massive [[Zaratan]] that swam the southern waters of the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]]. The zaratan seemed content to follow the directions of High Captain [[Orbachnar]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The temple's high priest, or High Captain, in the {{YearlinkName|1367}} was Orbachnar.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: The presence of the zaratan in the Sea of Fallen Stars was something of a mystery considering the creatures were native to distant [[Zakhara]]. However, one tale from the [[Time of Troubles]] told of a small army of [[reef giant]]s that left Zakhara with a large turtle strapped to their backs.
